member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not to automatically place measurements back into the processing queue if an exception occurs while processing. Defaults to false.

member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.
